      • connect

        public boolean connect(java.lang.String sURL,
              java.lang.String sUser,
              java.lang.String sPassword)
                throws org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Connect to Calendar Service
        Parameters:
        sURL - String Service base URL like http://localhost/hipergate/servlet/HttpCalendarServlet
        sUser - String User e-mail (must exist at k_users and k_fellows tables)
        sPassword - String User password
        Returns:
        true if successfully connected to the service
        Throws:
        org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException
        java.io.IOException

                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                          org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Disconnect from Calendar Service
        Returns:
        true if successfully disconnected from the service
        Throws:
